name: Destiny of Altrais
description: Evil continues to roam the land of Altrais and threaten the very existence of the races. Rumors have been heard, the Evil in the East does not even control the Armor of Legend and seeks to destroy all races that may be hiding it and claim the crown of Altrais.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or Better Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or Better Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
